notes: Reproduced all 5 compiler errors (4x CS0117, 1x CS1501) as reported. The old SKMatrix APIs (MakeIdentity, MakeTranslation, MakeScale, MakeRotation, static PostConcat with ref) were deprecated in v2.88.x with [Obsolete] attributes pointing to replacements (CreateIdentity, CreateTranslation, CreateScale, CreateRotation, instance PostConcat), and removed entirely in v3.x. This is an intentional breaking change — the v2.88.9 build succeeds with obsolete warnings showing the migration path. Suggest closing as by-design with a pointer to the new API names.

reproductionSteps.description: Create standalone console project with SkiaSharp 3.119.0 and write reproduction code using the old v2.88.9 SKMatrix APIs from the issue.
reproductionSteps.command: dotnet new console -n Repro --framework net8.0 && cd Repro && dotnet add package SkiaSharp --version 3.119.0

filesCreated.description: Reproduction code using all 5 old SKMatrix APIs reported in the issue.

reproductionSteps.description: Build with SkiaSharp 3.119.0 — expect CS0117 and CS1501 compiler errors for removed APIs.
reproductionSteps.output:
Repro net8.0 failed with 4 error(s)
  Program.cs(5,28): error CS0117: 'SKMatrix' does not contain a definition for 'MakeIdentity'
  Program.cs(8,28): error CS0117: 'SKMatrix' does not contain a definition for 'MakeTranslation'
  Program.cs(11,22): error CS0117: 'SKMatrix' does not contain a definition for 'MakeScale'
  Program.cs(14,25): error CS0117: 'SKMatrix' does not contain a definition for 'MakeRotation'

Build failed with 4 error(s) in 0.9s

reproductionSteps.description: Test PostConcat CS1501 separately (previous step's variable errors prevented reaching the PostConcat line).
reproductionSteps.output:
Repro net8.0 failed with 1 error(s)
  Program.cs(9,10): error CS1501: No overload for method 'PostConcat' takes 2 arguments

Build failed with 1 error(s) in 0.6s

reproductionSteps.description: Test with SkiaSharp 2.88.9 (last known good) to confirm old APIs existed with deprecation warnings.
reproductionSteps.command: dotnet add package SkiaSharp --version 2.88.9 && dotnet build
reproductionSteps.output:
Repro net8.0 succeeded with 5 warning(s)
  Program.cs(5,19): warning CS0618: 'SKMatrix.MakeIdentity()' is obsolete: 'Use CreateIdentity() instead.'
  Program.cs(8,19): warning CS0618: 'SKMatrix.MakeTranslation(float, float)' is obsolete: 'Use CreateTranslation(float, float) instead.'
  Program.cs(11,13): warning CS0618: 'SKMatrix.MakeScale(float, float, float, float)' is obsolete: 'Use CreateScale(float, float, float, float) instead.'
  Program.cs(14,16): warning CS0618: 'SKMatrix.MakeRotation(float, float, float)' is obsolete: 'Use CreateRotation(float, float, float) instead.'
  Program.cs(17,1): warning CS0618: 'SKMatrix.PostConcat(ref SKMatrix, SKMatrix)' is obsolete: 'Use PostConcat(SKMatrix) instead.'

Build succeeded with 5 warning(s) in 5.1s

reproductionSteps.description: Test with SkiaSharp 3.119.2 (latest stable) to confirm old APIs remain removed.
reproductionSteps.command: dotnet add package SkiaSharp --version 3.119.2 && dotnet build
reproductionSteps.output:
Program.cs(5,28): error CS0117: 'SKMatrix' does not contain a definition for 'MakeIdentity'
Program.cs(8,28): error CS0117: 'SKMatrix' does not contain a definition for 'MakeTranslation'
Program.cs(11,22): error CS0117: 'SKMatrix' does not contain a definition for 'MakeScale'
Program.cs(14,25): error CS0117: 'SKMatrix' does not contain a definition for 'MakeRotation'
Build FAILED.

reproductionSteps.description: Test on main (source) — confirm old APIs not present in source and all 20 SKMatrix tests pass with new APIs.
reproductionSteps.output: Passed! - Failed: 0, Passed: 20, Skipped: 0, Total: 20, Duration: 19 ms

versionResults.notes: Builds successfully with 5 CS0618 obsolete warnings showing renamed APIs: MakeIdentity->CreateIdentity, MakeTranslation->CreateTranslation, MakeScale->CreateScale, MakeRotation->CreateRotation, PostConcat(ref,matrix)->PostConcat(matrix).
Build fails with 4 CS0117 errors (MakeIdentity, MakeTranslation, MakeScale, MakeRotation). PostConcat CS1501 also confirmed separately.
Same 4 CS0117 errors as 3.119.0. Old APIs remain removed in latest stable.
Old Make* APIs do not exist in source. New Create* APIs confirmed present. All 20 SKMatrixTest tests pass with new APIs.

errorMessages.primaryError: CS0117: 'SKMatrix' does not contain a definition for 'MakeIdentity' / 'MakeTranslation' / 'MakeScale' / 'MakeRotation'; CS1501: No overload for method 'PostConcat' takes 2 arguments

CS0117: 'SKMatrix' does not contain a definition for 'MakeTranslation'
